content.html: A thing that shows the tech industry maturing is you don't see much - or at all - dunking on an outage/breach of a competitor. Instead, engineers at most competitors pay close attention, and try to learn from what happened, and stress-test & strengthen their own systems.
content.value:
A thing that shows the tech industry maturing is you don't see much - or at all - dunking on an outage/breach of a competitor.

Instead, engineers at most competitors pay close attention, and try to learn from what happened, and stress-test & strengthen their own systems.
